comment.body:
[@SadLoli:](?Profile/1MoonP8t4rk9QamBUPh5Aspkwa1Xhf5ux2/1PBCaxayoEqvXFuayjxzGJvPub3BMUJUJT/sadloli@zeroid.bit "mention:1PBCaxayoEqvXFuayjxzGJvPub3BMUJUJT") Hello! Maybe you could try to create a thread on there, some people might help you with your project
(This is MillChan btw, a reddit like zite)
http://127.0.0.1/1ADQAHsqsie5PBeQhQgjcKmUu3qdPFg6aA

[@SadLoli:](?Profile/1MoonP8t4rk9QamBUPh5Aspkwa1Xhf5ux2/1PBCaxayoEqvXFuayjxzGJvPub3BMUJUJT/sadloli@zeroid.bit "mention:1PBCaxayoEqvXFuayjxzGJvPub3BMUJUJT") I'm interested of course, but I have little to no knowledge of zeronet
So I can't really help, but feel free to keep me updated on your progress!

[@SadLoli:](?Profile/1MoonP8t4rk9QamBUPh5Aspkwa1Xhf5ux2/1PBCaxayoEqvXFuayjxzGJvPub3BMUJUJT/sadloli@zeroid.bit "mention:1PBCaxayoEqvXFuayjxzGJvPub3BMUJUJT") Oh and crap, this is more of an image board than a reddit/4chan like
Still, try on zites that look like these, you might get the support you need

[@SadLoli:](?Profile/1MoonP8t4rk9QamBUPh5Aspkwa1Xhf5ux2/1PBCaxayoEqvXFuayjxzGJvPub3BMUJUJT/sadloli@zeroid.bit "mention:1PBCaxayoEqvXFuayjxzGJvPub3BMUJUJT") Welp, I'll try to spread the word, and my zeronet instance should be running a lot, so I guess I can help seed?... ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

Downloading the big files right now!
...or not? I don't know, nothing's moving :/
And if it is, it's pretty slow... for now at least

@SadLoli: It did! But I had some trouble near the end
My 0net instance crashed a few times, but that's probably because I installed it like shit
Anyway, files downloaded, and seeding

(Also, somehow I downloaded 627mb, instead of the 622 announced... Weird)

EDIT: oh also, a little feature that could improve this a bit, maybe you could make it so it checks on eh if the gallery still exist, even if the metadata isn't in the database

Dude! Sadpanda is back!
Be sure to clean your "yay" cookie tho
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/482728998254936094/606850287084371971/1564699339570-1.png
Might be a big project, but could a full site backup of Sadpanda on 0net be possible?
